袺字的基本解释

袺
jié
用衣襟兜着：“采采苤苢，薄言袺之。”
袖。

袺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》古屑切，入屑，見。］
［《廣韻》古黠切，入黠，見。］
手提起衣襟兜东西。

袺字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　袺； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1116第06
【唐韻】古屑切【集韻】吉屑切，?音結。【詩·周南】薄言袺之。【爾雅·釋器】執衽謂之袺。【註】掎衣上衽。　又訖黠切，音戛。義同。

袺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
袺字的起名意思

暂无。

lift up a dress

lift up a dress
jié
Putting it around in the skirt: "Pick and pick kohlrabi, squeeze it with thin words."
sleeve.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guangyun" ancient chip cutting, into the chip, see. ]
["Guangyun" cut from ancient points, enter the points, see. ]
Lift your hands and pocket things.
lift up a dress
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　袺; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1116 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Ancient chip cutting [Ji Yun] Ji chip cutting, sound knot. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】Those with thin words. 【Erya·Release Device】Zhijun is called a scorpion. [Note] Tuck the gusset on the clothes.　 Cut again and again, the sound is stunned. The same meaning.
